(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA1-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WEA1-1)
            (parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Atmospheric winds")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-1* 1.0))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA1-1-attribdegraded-1    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA1-1)
            (parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Atmospheric winds")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-1* 0.67))
)

            (Parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)

            (Parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)

           )

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA1-1-attribdegraded-4    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA1-1)
            (parameter "1.4.1 atmospheric wind speed")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Atmospheric winds")
            (attribute "Insufficient vertical spatial resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-1* 0.5))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA1-2-attribdegraded-1    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.4.2 atmospheric wind direction") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)

                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))

    =>

    (assert

            (parameter "1.4.2 atmospheric wind direction")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Atmospheric winds")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA1-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-2* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA1-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-2* 0.67))
)

            (Parameter "3.4.1 Ocean surface wind speed") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))

    =>

    (assert

            (parameter "3.4.1 Ocean surface wind speed")

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA1-3* (max ?*subobj-WEA1-3* 1.0))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA2-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.2 O3") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Highest-1h-orless) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WEA2-1)
            (parameter "1.8.2 O3")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "High temporal resolution air pollution")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA2-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA2-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-1* 1.0))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA2-1-attribdegraded-4    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.2 O3") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))

            (attribute "Insufficient temporal resolution (hours)")

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA2-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-1* (* 0.75 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA2-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-1* 0.75))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA2-1-attribdegraded-5    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.2 O3") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA2-3* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-3* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA2-3* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-3* 0.5))

            (parameter "1.8.8 CH2O and non-CH4 VOC")

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA2-5-attribdegraded-2    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.11 SO2") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Some)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Highest-1h-orless) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA2-5)
            (parameter "1.8.11 SO2")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "High temporal resolution air pollution")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA2-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-5* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA2-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-5* 0.33))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA2-5-attribdegraded-3    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.11 SO2") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Highest-1h-orless) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA2-5)
            (parameter "1.8.11 SO2")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "High temporal resolution air pollution")
            (attribute "Insufficient vertical spatial resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA2-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-5* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA2-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-5* 0.5))
)

                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))

    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WEA2-6)
            (parameter "1.8.13 Black carbon and other polluting aerosols")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "High temporal resolution air pollution")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA2-6* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-6* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA2-6* (max ?*subobj-WEA2-6* 1.0))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA3-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.2.1 Atmospheric temperature fields") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Highest-1h-orless) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WEA3-1)
            (parameter "1.2.1 Atmospheric temperature fields")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "All-weather temperature and humidity profiles")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA3-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA3-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-1* 1.0))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA3-1-attribdegraded-1    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.2.1 Atmospheric temperature fields") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Highest-1h-orless) 0))

            (parameter "1.2.1 Atmospheric temperature fields")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "All-weather temperature and humidity profiles")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA3-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-1* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA3-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-1* 0.67))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Highest-1h-orless) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA3-2)
            (parameter "1.3.1 Atmospheric humidity -indirect-")
            (value 0.66)
            (objective "All-weather temperature and humidity profiles")
            (attribute "Insufficient sensitivity in the lower troposphere")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA3-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-2* (* 0.66 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA3-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-2* 0.66))

                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

            (objective "All-weather temperature and humidity profiles")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA3-3* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-3* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA3-3* (max ?*subobj-WEA3-3* 1.0))

                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 High-200m-orless) 0))

            (parameter "1.1.1 aerosol height/optical depth")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Comprehensive tropospheric aerosol characterization")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA4-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA4-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA4-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA4-1* 1.0))

            (Parameter "1.1.2 aerosol shape, composition, physical and chemical properties") (science-multiplier ?mult)

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA5-1)
            (parameter "1.3.3 GPS radio occultation")
            (value 0.2)
            (objective "Radio Occultation")
            (attribute "Insufficient temporal resolution (1 week)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA5-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA5-1* (* 0.2 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA5-1* (max ?*subobj-WEA5-1* 0.2))
)

                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA6-2)
            (parameter "1.8.4 CH4")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Comprehensive tropospheric O3 measurements")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA6-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA6-2* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA6-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA6-2* 0.67))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WEA6-3-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.8 CH2O and non-CH4 VOC") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WEA6-3)
            (parameter "1.8.8 CH2O and non-CH4 VOC")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Comprehensive tropospheric O3 measurements")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA6-3* (max ?*subobj-WEA6-3* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA6-3* (max ?*subobj-WEA6-3* 1.0))
)

            (Parameter "1.8.5 CO") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WEA6-5)
            (parameter "1.8.5 CO")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Comprehensive tropospheric O3 measurements")
            (attribute "Insufficient temporal resolution (&lt;1 week)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA6-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA6-5* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA6-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA6-5* 0.5))

            (objective "Aerosol-cloud discovery")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (&gt;1km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA7-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-2* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA7-2* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-2* 0.5))

            (parameter "1.6.3 Cloud particle phase - ice/water transition")

            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (&gt;1km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA7-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-5* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA7-5* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-5* 0.5))

            (parameter "1.1.1 aerosol height/optical depth")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Aerosol-cloud discovery")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (&gt;1km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA7-8* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-8* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA7-8* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-8* 0.5))
)

                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)

    =>

            (parameter "1.1.4 aerosol extinction profiles/vertical concentration")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Aerosol-cloud discovery")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WEA7-11* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-11* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WEA7-11* (max ?*subobj-WEA7-11* 0.33))

            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI1-2* (max ?*subobj-CLI1-2* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-CLI1-2* (max ?*subobj-CLI1-2* 1.0))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::CLI1-4-attribdegraded-3    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.6.2 cloud ice particle size distribution") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)

            (parameter "1.7.1 Cloud liquid water and precipitation rate")

            (attribute "Insufficient temporal resolution (&lt; 1week)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI1-6* (max ?*subobj-CLI1-6* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-CLI1-6* (max ?*subobj-CLI1-6* 0.5))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))

    =>

    (assert

            (parameter "1.1.1 aerosol height/optical depth")
            (value 0.25)
            (objective "Aerosol-Cloud Forcing")
            (attribute "Insufficient spatial resolution (~tens of km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI1-8* (max ?*subobj-CLI1-8* (* 0.25 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-CLI1-8* (max ?*subobj-CLI1-8* 0.25))

            (Parameter "4.3.2 Sea ice cover") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Lowest-3weeks-or-more) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI2-6)
            (parameter "4.3.2 Sea ice cover")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Ice Sheet, Sea Ice Volume and Ice Dynamics")
            (attribute "Insufficient accuracy")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI2-6* (max ?*subobj-CLI2-6* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-CLI2-6* (max ?*subobj-CLI2-6* 0.5))
)

            (Parameter "3.2.1 Sea level height") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective CLI5-1)
            (parameter "3.2.1 Sea level height")

        )
    )

    ;(bind ?*subobj-CLI5-1* (max ?*subobj-CLI5-1* 1.0))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective CLI5-4)
            (parameter "3.4.2 Ocean surface wind direction")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Ocean Circulation, Heat Storage, and Climate Forcing")
            (attribute "Insufficient retrieval accuracy due to missing X-band")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-CLI5-4* (max ?*subobj-CLI5-4* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-CLI5-4* (max ?*subobj-CLI5-4* 0.5))
)

            (objective "Ecosystem Function")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (~km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ECO1-2* (max ?*subobj-ECO1-2* (* 0.25 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-ECO1-2* (max ?*subobj-ECO1-2* 0.25))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::ECO1-2-attribdegraded-5    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "2.6.3 disaster monitoring") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective ECO1-2)
            (parameter "2.6.3 disaster monitoring")
            (value 0.1)
            (objective "Ecosystem Function")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (tens of km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

            (Parameter "2.6.2 landcover status") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

    ;(bind ?*subobj-ECO1-3* (max ?*subobj-ECO1-3* 0.2))

            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ECO1-5* (max ?*subobj-ECO1-5* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-ECO1-5* (max ?*subobj-ECO1-5* 0.33))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::ECO1-5-attribdegraded-3    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "A2.Fire Monitoring") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))

            (parameter "A2.Fire Monitoring")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Ecosystem Function")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (~hundreds of m)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::ECO2-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "2.4.1 vegetation type and structure") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective ECO2-1)
            (parameter "2.4.1 vegetation type and structure")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Ecosystem Structure and Biomass")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ECO2-1* (max ?*subobj-ECO2-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-ECO2-1* (max ?*subobj-ECO2-1* 1.0))
)

    =>

            (value 0.5)

            (attribute "Degraded accuracy due to no polarimetry")

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))

    )

            (Parameter "2.4.4 canopy density") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))

            (parameter "2.4.4 canopy density")
            (value 0.2)

    )

    ;(bind ?*subobj-ECO2-3* (max ?*subobj-ECO2-3* 0.2))

            (Parameter "3.1.1 Ocean color - 410-680nm -Chlorophyll absorption and fluorescence, pigments, phytoplankton, CDOM-") (science-multiplier ?mult)

            (value 1.0)

            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective ECO4-4)
            (parameter "3.2.5 river plumes/sediment fluxes")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Coastal Ecosystem Dynamics")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-ECO4-4* (max ?*subobj-ECO4-4* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-ECO4-4* (max ?*subobj-ECO4-4* 0.33))
)

                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)

                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WAT2-1)
            (parameter "2.7.1 river and lake elevation")
            (value 0.2)
            (objective "Surface water and ocean topography")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (hundreds of m)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WAT2-1* (max ?*subobj-WAT2-1* (* 0.2 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WAT2-1* (max ?*subobj-WAT2-1* 0.2))
)

            (Parameter "4.2.1 snow-water equivalence") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Cold-regions))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WAT3-1)
            (parameter "4.2.1 snow-water equivalence")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Snow and cold land processes")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WAT3-1* (max ?*subobj-WAT3-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WAT3-1* (max ?*subobj-WAT3-1* 1.0))
)

    ;(bind ?*subobj-WAT3-2* (max ?*subobj-WAT3-2* 0.2))

            (Parameter "4.2.3 snow wetness") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::WAT4-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.3.1 Atmospheric humidity -indirect-") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective WAT4-1)
            (parameter "1.3.1 Atmospheric humidity -indirect-")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Water vapor transport")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WAT4-2* (max ?*subobj-WAT4-2* (* 0.25 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WAT4-2* (max ?*subobj-WAT4-2* 0.25))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Lowest-3weeks-or-more) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective WAT5-4)
            (parameter "4.1.4 Ice sheet velocity")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Sea Ice thickness, glacier surface elevation and glacier velocity")
            (attribute "Insufficient cross-track imaging capability (multi-angle req&#39;d)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WAT5-4* (max ?*subobj-WAT5-4* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-WAT5-4* (max ?*subobj-WAT5-4* 1.0))
)

            (parameter "2.6.1 land use")
            (value 0.5)

            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-WAT7-3* (max ?*subobj-WAT7-3* (* 0.5 ?mult)))

                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)

                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)

           )

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-1)
            (parameter "1.8.2 O3")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Insufficient vertical spatial resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-1* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-1* 0.5))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA1-3-attribdegraded-2    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.14 ClO, BrO, halogen compounds") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Some)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-3)
            (parameter "1.8.14 ClO, BrO, halogen compounds")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-3* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-3* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-3* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-3* 0.33))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA1-3-attribdegraded-4    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.14 ClO, BrO, halogen compounds") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-3)
            (parameter "1.8.14 ClO, BrO, halogen compounds")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Insufficient vertical spatial resolution")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-3* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-3* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-3* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-3* 0.5))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA1-3-attribdegraded-5    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA1-4-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.10 H2O2, OH, HO2 and isotopes -HDO, H218O-") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-4)
            (parameter "1.8.10 H2O2, OH, HO2 and isotopes -HDO, H218O-")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-4* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-4* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-4* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-4* 1.0))
)

    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-4* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-4* (* 0.2 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-4* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-4* 0.2))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA1-5-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.3 CO2") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)

            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Insufficient accuracy")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-6* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-6* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-6* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-6* 0.5))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA1-6-attribdegraded-7    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.4 CH4") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Medium-1day-3days) 0))

                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-8)
            (parameter "1.8.7 NOx-NO, NO2-, N2O5, HNO3")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Insufficient temporal resolution (&lt;1 week)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-8* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-8* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-8* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-8* 0.5))
)

                                                                (Spectral-sampling Multispectral-10-100-channels)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-low-10-100km) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-10)
            (parameter "1.9.2 Spectrally resolved IR radiance -200-2000cm-1-")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Insufficient spectral sampling  (multispectral)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-10* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-10* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-10* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-10* 0.67))
)

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))

    =>

            (parameter "1.1.4 aerosol extinction profiles/vertical concentration")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Insufficient sensitivity in the troposphere")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-14* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-14* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-14* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-14* 0.33))

                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-19)
            (parameter "1.6.1 cloud height/optical thickness")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-19* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-19* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-19* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-19* 0.33))
)

            (Parameter "1.6.1 cloud height/optical thickness") (science-multiplier ?mult)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA1-20-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.6.2 cloud ice particle size distribution") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective HEA1-20)
            (parameter "1.6.2 cloud ice particle size distribution")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Ozone Processes: Ultraviolet Radiation and Cancer")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA1-20* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-20* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA1-20* (max ?*subobj-HEA1-20* 1.0))
)

            (Parameter "1.8.16 Visible atmospheric plumes") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Most)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA3-1)
            (parameter "1.8.16 Visible atmospheric plumes")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Acute Toxic Pollution and Releases")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA3-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA3-1* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA3-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA3-1* 0.67))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA3-2-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.1.5 aerosol size and size distribution") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective HEA3-2)
            (parameter "1.1.5 aerosol size and size distribution")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Acute Toxic Pollution and Releases")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA3-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA3-2* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA3-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA3-2* 1.0))
)

            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA3-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA3-2* (* 0.2 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA3-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA3-2* 0.2))
)

            (Parameter "1.1.4 aerosol extinction profiles/vertical concentration") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)

        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-2* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-2* 0.67))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA4-2-attribdegraded-6    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.1.5 aerosol size and size distribution") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA4-2)
            (parameter "1.1.5 aerosol size and size distribution")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (&gt;10km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-2* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-2* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-2* 0.33))
)

            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Only most of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-4* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-4* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-4* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-4* 0.67))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA4-4-attribdegraded-2    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.5 CO") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Some)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA4-5-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.7 NOx-NO, NO2-, N2O5, HNO3") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective HEA4-5)
            (parameter "1.8.7 NOx-NO, NO2-, N2O5, HNO3")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-5* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-5* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-5* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-5* 1.0))
)

                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Some)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA4-7)
            (parameter "1.8.11 SO2")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-7* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-7* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-7* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-7* 0.33))
)

            (Parameter "1.8.4 CH4") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))

    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective HEA4-8)
            (parameter "1.8.4 CH4")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-8* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-8* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-8* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-8* 1.0))
)

                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))

    =>

            (parameter "1.1.2 aerosol shape, composition, physical and chemical properties")
            (value 0.67)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Insufficient horizontal spatial resolution (a few km)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-10* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-10* (* 0.67 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-10* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-10* 0.67))

    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-12* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-12* 0.67))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA4-12-attribdegraded-2    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.2 O3") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Some)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

            (parameter "1.8.2 O3")
            (value 0.33)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Only some of the region of interest is covered")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-12* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-12* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-12* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-12* 0.33))

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-13* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-13* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-13* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-13* 0.5))
)

    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-15* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-15* (* 0.33 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-15* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-15* 0.33))

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA4-15-attribdegraded-3    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "1.8.8 CH2O and non-CH4 VOC") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-2km-or-greater) 0))

            (parameter "1.8.8 CH2O and non-CH4 VOC")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Insufficient vertical spatial resolution (some)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Vertical-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-200m-2km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

            (parameter "1.8.11 SO2")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Insufficient accuracy")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-16* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-16* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-16* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-16* 0.5))

                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val3 Medium-1day-3days) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val4 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective HEA4-18)
            (parameter "1.8.13 Black carbon and other polluting aerosols")
            (value 0.2)
            (objective "Air Pollution and Respiratory and Cardiovascular Diseases")
            (attribute "Insufficient vertical spatial resolution (total column only)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA4-18* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-18* (* 0.2 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA4-18* (max ?*subobj-HEA4-18* 0.2))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA5-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "3.1.1 Ocean color - 410-680nm -Chlorophyll absorption and fluorescence, pigments, phytoplankton, CDOM-") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective HEA5-1)
            (parameter "3.1.1 Ocean color - 410-680nm -Chlorophyll absorption and fluorescence, pigments, phytoplankton, CDOM-")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Algal Blooms and Waterborne Infectious Diseases")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA5-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA5-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA5-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA5-1* 1.0))
)

            (objective "Algal Blooms and Waterborne Infectious Diseases")
            (attribute "Suboptimal illumination conditions (not SSO)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-HEA5-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA5-1* (* 0.2 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-HEA5-1* (max ?*subobj-HEA5-1* 0.2))
)






(defrule REQUIREMENTS::HEA5-2-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "3.1.3 Extended ocean color - NIR -atmospheric correction-") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 US))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Medium-100m-1km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))
        
    
    =>

            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Algal Blooms and Waterborne Infectious Diseases")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))

    )

            (parameter "2.5.1 Surface temperature -land-")

            (objective "Vector-borne and Zoonotic Disease")
            (attribute "Insufficient accuracy")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))

            (Parameter "1.7.1 Cloud liquid water and precipitation rate") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Low-1km-10km) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 High-12h-24h) 0))

            (parameter "1.7.1 Cloud liquid water and precipitation rate")
            (value 0.2)

            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::SOL1-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "2.2.1 surface deformation") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective SOL1-1)
            (parameter "2.2.1 surface deformation")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Surface deformation")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-SOL1-1* (max ?*subobj-SOL1-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-SOL1-1* (max ?*subobj-SOL1-1* 1.0))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::SOL2-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "2.6.5 surface composition") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Low-3days-1-week) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective SOL2-1)
            (parameter "2.6.5 surface composition")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "Surface composition")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-SOL2-1* (max ?*subobj-SOL2-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-SOL2-1* (max ?*subobj-SOL2-1* 1.0))
)

            (Parameter "2.6.5 surface composition") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Temporal-resolution ?val4&~nil)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 High-10-100m) 0))

    ;(bind ?*subobj-SOL2-1* (max ?*subobj-SOL2-1* 0.5))

                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Temporal-resolution ?val4 Very-low-1-3-weeks) 0))
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective SOL2-3)
            (parameter "2.6.4 hydrocarbon reservoir monitoring")
            (value 0.5)
            (objective "Surface composition")
            (attribute "Insufficient temporal resolution (weeks)")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-SOL2-3* (max ?*subobj-SOL2-3* (* 0.5 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-SOL2-3* (max ?*subobj-SOL2-3* 0.5))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::SOL3-1-attribnominal    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "2.2.2 Hi-res topography") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy High)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-high-1-10m) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::fully-satisfied            (subobjective SOL3-1)
            (parameter "2.2.2 Hi-res topography")
            (value 1.0)
            (objective "High resolution topography")
            (attribute "Conditions for full satisfaction ")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-SOL3-1* (max ?*subobj-SOL3-1* (* 1.0 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-SOL3-1* (max ?*subobj-SOL3-1* 1.0))
)

(defrule REQUIREMENTS::SOL3-2-attribdegraded-7    ?m <- (REQUIREMENTS::Measurement
            (Parameter "2.7.2 flood monitoring") (science-multiplier ?mult)
                                                (Region-of-interest ?val1&~nil)
                                                                (Coverage-of-region-of-interest Global)
                                                                (Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3&~nil)
                                                                (Accuracy Medium)
                                        (taken-by ?who)
           )

        
                    (test (ContainsRegion ?val1 Global))
        
    
        
    
                    (test (>= (SameOrBetter Horizontal-Spatial-Resolution ?val3 Very-high-1-10m) 0))
        
    
        
    
    =>

    (assert

        (REASONING::partially-satisfied            (subobjective SOL3-2)
            (parameter "2.7.2 flood monitoring")
            (value 0.25)
            (objective "High resolution topography")
            (attribute "Insufficient accuracy")
            (taken-by ?who)
            (requirement-id (?m getFactId))
        )
    )
    (bind ?*subobj-SOL3-2* (max ?*subobj-SOL3-2* (* 0.25 ?mult)))
    ;(bind ?*subobj-SOL3-2* (max ?*subobj-SOL3-2* 0.25))
)
